definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Techniques were developed to hook many transistors into chips.
sentences.chinese: 將許多電晶體聯結到晶片上的技術已發展成了。

sentences.english: See last two items in HBT set.
sentences.chinese: 見異質接面雙極電晶體最後兩項。

sentences.english: The gate to turn the transistor off and on could encircle the silicon finger.
sentences.chinese: 控制電晶體開與關的閘極則圍繞著矽質指狀物。

sentences.english: A transistor with a thin gate oxide being driven by too high of a voltage.
sentences.chinese: 一個用薄柵氧化層電晶體被太多的驅動電壓高。

sentences.english: It suggests the significance of intramolecular charge transfer on the transistor characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 這顯示了在電晶體中有顯著的分子內電子轉移。

sentences.english: A circuit diagram of a transistor amplifier.
sentences.chinese: 電晶體放大器的線路圖。
